flavorText: . . . but he'll have you for lunch.

foreignData.name: Einsiedler vom Schnackhügel // Einsamer Wolf vom Schnackhügel
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn ein Gegner während deines Zuges einen Zauberspruch wirkt, ziehe zwei Karten.
Zu Beginn jedes Versorgungssegments und falls ein Spieler im letzten Zug zwei oder mehr Zaubersprüche gewirkt hat, transformiere den Einsamen Wolf vom Schnackhügel.

foreignData.name: Ermitaño de Parlaloma // Lobo solitario de Parlaloma
foreignData.text:
Siempre que un oponente lance un hechizo durante tu turno, roba dos cartas.
Al comienzo de cada mantenimiento, si un jugador lanzó dos o más hechizos en el último turno, transforma al Lobo solitario de Parlaloma.

foreignData.name: Ermite de Montbabil // Loup solitaire de Montbabil
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'un adversaire lance un sort pendant votre tour, piochez deux cartes.
Au début de chaque entretien, si un joueur a lancé au moins deux sorts au tour précédent, transformez le Loup solitaire de Montbabil.

foreignData.flavorText: ... ma non disdegnerà averti per cena.
foreignData.name: Eremita dei Poggi Borbottanti // Lupo Solitario dei Poggi Borbottanti
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta un avversario lancia una magia durante il tuo turno, pesca due carte.
All'inizio di ogni mantenimento, se nell'ultimo turno un giocatore ha lanciato due o più magie, trasforma il Lupo Solitario dei Poggi Borbottanti.

foreignData.faceName: ナッターノールズの一匹狼
foreignData.flavorText: ……あなたを昼食に招くだろう。
foreignData.name: ナッターノールズの隠遁者 // ナッターノールズの一匹狼
foreignData.text:
対戦相手があなたのターンに呪文を１つ唱えるたび、カードを２枚引く。
各アップキープの開始時に、直前のターンにプレイヤー１人が２つ以上の呪文を唱えていた場合、ナッターノールズの一匹狼を変身させる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー ― - 狼男

foreignData.flavorText: . . . 하지만 그는 점심식사로 널 먹을 것이다.
foreignData.name: 재잘대는 둔덕의 은둔자 // 재잘대는 둔덕의 외로운 늑대
foreignData.text:
당신의 턴에 상대가 주문을 발동할 때마다, 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
각 유지단 시작에, 만약 한 플레이어가 지난 턴에 두 개 이상의 주문을 발동했다면, 재잘대는 둔덕의 외로운 늑대를 변신시킨다.

foreignData.flavorText: ... mas ele aceitará você para o almoço.
foreignData.name: Eremita do Monte Rezinga // Lobo Solitário do Monte Rezinga
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que um oponente conjurar uma mágica durante o seu turno, compre dois cards.
No início de cada manutenção, se um jogador tiver conjurado duas ou mais mágicas no último turno, transforme Lobo Solitário do Monte Rezinga.

foreignData.name: Отшельник Болтливых Холмов // Волк-Одиночка Болтливых Холмов
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда оппонент разыгрывает заклинание во время вашего хода, возьмите две карты.
В начале каждого шага поддержки, если в предыдущем ходу игрок разыграл не менее двух заклинаний, трансформируйте Волка-Одиночку Болтливых Холмов.

foreignData.name: 纳特丘隐者 // 纳特丘独狼
foreignData.text:
每当对手在你的回合中施放咒语时，抓两张牌。
在每个维持开始时，若某牌手上回合施放了两个或更多咒语，转化纳特丘独狼。

foreignData.name: 納特丘隱者 // 納特丘獨狼
foreignData.text:
每當對手在你的回合中施放咒語時，抽兩張牌。
在每個維持開始時，若某玩家上回合施放了兩個或更多咒語，轉化納特丘獨狼。

name: Hermit of the Natterknolls // Lone Wolf of the Natterknolls
originalText:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, draw two cards.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Lone Wolf of the Natterknolls.

rulings.text: You may cast spells or activate abilities after the first ability of Hermit of the Natterknolls has resolved but before the spell that caused it to trigger has resolved.
The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.
The first ability of Hermit of the Natterknolls will resolve even if the spell your opponent casts is countered.
The first ability of Lone Wolf of the Natterknolls will resolve even if the spell your opponent casts is countered.
You may cast spells or activate abilities after the first ability of Lone Wolf of the Natterknolls has resolved but before the spell that caused it to trigger has resolved.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

text:
